General.Name: Beijing Vantone Real Estate Co Ltd
General.Description: Vantone Neo Development Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of real estate properties. Its property portfolio comprises residential buildings, office buildings, hotel apartments, and shops. The company also provides real estate brokerage; real estate information consulting; project investment; investment management; asset management; technology promotion; general construction contracting; professional contracting; and sports project management services. In addition, it engages in the sales culture supplies; building materials; computer software; hardware and peripheral equipment; design, production, agency, and advertising; and undertaking exhibition activities. Vantone Neo Development Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Wantong Center, Office Building, Beijing, China, 100020
